ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent user from updating the status to "Canceled" when Status <>Draft, Created, Assigned or when the "Reason for cancellation" is empty. This will prevent user from doing updates
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Draft"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Assigned"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Created")), ISBLANK(CH_ReasonForCancellation__c), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Cancelled"), CH_RecordTypeCheck__c, CH_RecordTypeDevName__c <> 'CH_Problem' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can not Cancel Case when Initial Response milestone is not completed
